description:
Griff's Great Britain: Series-1

Nature Documentary hosted by Griff Rhys Jones , published by ITV in 2016 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/5/51/Griffs-Great-Britain-Series-1-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Griffs Great Britain: Series-1
Griff Rhys Jones sets out to explore eight very disparate kinds of quintessentially British terrain, investigating how they have dictated different ways of living, working and playing - both in the past and as they are now - across the entire country, while also unearthing quirky and funny facts en route.




8)  Borders 
Griff explores the Shropshire countryside along the border between England and Wales, taking to the air to survey the landscape in all its glory. He then embarks on his final challenge, which takes him from Ludlow to the engineering marvel that is Chirk Aqueduct and on to Church Stretton and the Llangollen Canal.
